68. $y=\cfrac{6|x-3|}{x^2-3x}=\cfrac{6|x-3|}{x(x-3)}=\begin{cases} \cfrac{6}{x},\ x>3,\\ -\cfrac{6}{x},\ x<3.\end{cases}$
